<!-- Groundwork -->
$$
\gdef\sub#1{_{\mathrm{#1}}}
\gdef\unit#1{\mathrm{#1}}
$$
<!-- Physical units -->
$$
\gdef\celsius{\unit{Â°C}}
\gdef\joule{\unit{J}}
\gdef\kelvin{\unit{K}}
\gdef\kilogram{\unit{kg}}
\gdef\liter{\unit{L}}
\gdef\milliliter{\unit{mL}}

<!-- Exponentiated units -->
$$
\gdef\squaremeter{\meter^2}
\gdef\cubicmeter{\meter^3}
$$
<!-- Combined physical units -->
$$
\gdef\newtonperkilogram{\frac{\newton}{\kilogram}}
\gdef\joulepermole{\frac{\joule}{\mole}}
\gdef\jouleperkilogram{\frac{\joule}{\kilogram}}
\gdef\jouleperkelvin{\frac{\joule}{\kelvin}}
\gdef\jouleperkilogramperkelvin{\frac{\joule}{\kilogram\,\kelvin}}
\gdef\joulepermoleperkelvin{\frac{\joule}{\mole\,\kelvin}}
$$
